title: Prop Firm Trader (FX / Indices / Crypto)
description:
Hello Traders!



Isla Capital is growing! I’m looking for more disciplined and experienced prop firm traders to join our team and trade evaluation and funded accounts through established prop firms (FTMO, Apex, Alpha Capital Group, or similar). This role is for professionals who understand prop firm rules, manage risk responsibly, and can trade consistently. It will eventually expand into live portfolio management. 



You will:

- Trade prop firm challenge / evals and then funded accounts

- Strictly follow all prop firm rules and drawdown limits

- Maintain daily trade journals

- Provide regular performance updates



Requirements:

-Experience trading prop firm accounts

- Strong risk management and discipline

- Ability to work independently

- Honest, reliable communication

- Understanding of scalping and/or day trading



Compensation:

- Base Salary Pay

- Eval Passing Bonus

- Profit sharing on funded account payouts

- Large Performance Bonuses upon payout Milestones



This is a performance-first setup designed for disciplined traders who want to grow long-term with a serious operation. Our mission is for our filipino traders to earn significant money for themselves and families.   



Important:

- Accounts must be registered under trader’s name due to prop firm rules, but all accounts and profits belong to Isla Capital

- We cover all costs for Prop Firm Evals/Challenges

- Strict confidentiality required



Please apply here and let me know:

- A little bit about you

- Prop firm experience

- Trading style and Psychology



Let's make some money together!

title: CRM & Automations Specialist
description:
We are currently looking for a CRM and Automations Specialist for our client, Growth Machine.



Growth Machine embeds high-performance revenue systems inside growing professional services and SAAS businesses by aligning strategy, sales coaching, outbound sales campaigns, funnel optimisation, CRM architecture, marketing and automation into one cohesive Growth Machine. 



This role exists to ensure our clients’ CRM infrastructure is clean, strategic, scalable, and directly enabling stronger pipeline visibility, higher conversion rates, and reduced revenue leakage.



Key Responsibilities

? Conduct CRM audits (Zoho & GoHighLevel)

? Architect CRM consolidations and migrations

? Map and import large datasets with precision

? Build pipelines and automation sequences

? Segment databases and structure lifecycle flows

? Maintain CRM documentation and architecture maps

? Provide strategic recommendations to Lead Strategist

? Maintain system integrity inside live CRM environments



Required Experience & Credentials

? Minimum 5 years hands-on experience working with Zoho CRM

? Minimum 2 years hands-on experience working with GoHighLevel

? Proven experience migrating and consolidating CRM accounts

? Demonstrated experience building automation at scale

? Present relevant certifications or credentials (Zoho, GHL, automation platforms if available)

? Strong portfolio or case studies of previous CRM builds



Technical Competencies

? Advanced Zoho and GoHighLevel CRM configuration and architecture

? Advanced Zoho and GoHighLevel automation systems

? Field mapping and large dataset migration

? Pipeline design and lifecycle automation

? Automation debugging and QA testing

? Integration tools such as Zapier, Make, or n8n

title: Digital Marketing Specialist - E-commerce & Social Media
description:
Full job description

Join Our Team: Crafting Beauty, Inspiring Confidence

At Beautifier LLC, creativity is our foundation, and collaboration is our strength. We're a team of passionate individuals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of beauty, developing products that inspire self-expression and ignite confidence. From personal care essentials to other beauty must-haves, our company has a reputation to be the best in the market.

Digital Marketing Specialist - E-commerce & Social Media

We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to optimize and manage our online presence across Amazon, our Shopify website, and key social media channels (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and
). This role is crucial for driving traffic, increasing conversions, and building brand awareness in a dynamic digital landscape.

Responsibilities

This role will focus on the daily management and optimization of our online presence across various platforms, ensuring a cohesive and high-performing digital marketing strategy.

o Amazon Marketplace Management:

?Create and optimize Product Detail Pages (PDPs) by developing high-quality content, including product titles, descriptions, images, bullet points, and keywords that align with Amazon SEO best practices.

?Monitor product performance, sales rankings, customer reviews, and competitor activity to identify opportunities for improvement.

?Implement and update A+ Content (Enhanced Brand Content) to enhance brand storytelling and product presentation.





o Shopify Website Marketing:

?Develop and execute strategies to drive organic traffic to our Shopify website through SEO and other digital channels.

?Manage website content updates, product merchandising, and user experience optimizations to improve conversion rates.

?Analyze website analytics (e.g., Google Analytics) to identify trends, user behavior, and areas for optimization.

o Social Media & Content Marketing (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and
):

?Develop creative briefs, stories, and mood boards for all video content.

?Arrange and manage meetings with third-party vendors, such as production companies, to facilitate video creation.

?Develop and implement engaging content strategies for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube to increase brand awareness, engagement, and drive traffic.

?Develop, execute, and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Meta platforms 
/Instagram) using Meta Ads Manager to drive traffic and sales.

?Manage our presence on Meta platforms, utilizing tools like Meta Business Suite for content planning, scheduling, and organic performance tracking.

?Create, schedule, and publish compelling visual and video content tailored to each platform's best practices.

?Monitor social media trends, competitor activities, and audience feedback to refine content strategy.

?Engage with followers, respond to comments, and foster a strong online community.

o General Marketing & Analytics:

?Collaborate with the creative team to develop compelling visual and video assets for all platforms.

?Track, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) across all marketing channels.

?Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, platform updates, and best practices.

Basic Qualifications

?Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.

?3+ years of professional experience in digital marketing, with a strong focus on Amazon Seller Central and social media platforms.

?Experience in the beauty, cosmetics, or personal care industry.

?Proven experience with Shopify platform management.

?Proven experience with paid social media advertising, specifically on Meta platforms, including campaign setup, audience targeting, and performance analysis.

?Demonstrable experience with social media content creation, scheduling, and community management on Instagram, TikTok, and/or YouTube.

?Hands-on experience with design tools, including Figma and Adobe Photoshop, for creating visual assets.

?Strong understanding of SEO principles and their application across websites and Amazon.

?Proficiency in using marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Amazon Brand Analytics).

?Excellent written and verbal communication skills with an ability to create engaging copy.

?Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

?Bilingual in English and Chinese will be a plus.

Preferred Qualifications

?Familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut) or AI tools for creating short-form video content.

?Experience with
 marketing platforms.

?Ability to balance creative excellence with strategic business objectives.

?Agility in adapting to rapidly evolving technologies and digital marketing trends.

?A genuine passion for digital marketing and staying ahead of the curve in online consumer behavior.

Work Style

?Self-motivated and able to work independently

?Work Location: Hybrid remote in Philippine & California & China

?Strong time-management and multitasking abilities

?Proactive problem solver with a collaborative mindset





Beautifier Featured Benefits:

?Company paid:

Health, dental, vision, basic life insurance, short and long term disability, and parental leave

?Quarterly company profit sharing opportunity

?Robust Paid Time Off (PTO)

?Paid holidays

?Paid parental leave

?Performance and Safety recognition awards

?Gym reimbursement



Why work at Beautifier?

At Beautifier, our tea
mbers are our smartest investment. In addition to our *dazzling* company culture, associate engagement and recognition initiatives, our benefits package, competitive compensation, and career development opportunities are important ways of showing them that we invest in our employee’s personal and professional success.

Become an integral member of the community to create and maintain a safe, efficient, and responsive work environment and support the Company’s plan to be a desirable workplace. Help build a healthy community whose members share a common goal, accept personal responsibility, earn each other’s respect, excel in their tasks, help each other be successful, participate in the social benefits of being associated with a winning team and Company profits and provide creative, enjoyable opportunities for all.

title: Website, SEO, Google Business Profile & Digital/Phone Marketing
description:
We run a growing home care business that helps seniors live longer, healthier, and more independent lives in their own homes. We’re focused on results, sustainability, and long-term growth—not hype, vanity metrics, or shortcuts.



We’re looking for a skilled Virtual Assistant who understands how websites, SEO, Google Business Profiles, and marketing systems work together to consistently generate qualified inquiries and phone calls.



This is a hands-on execution role, not a strategy-only role.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

Website Management



Maintain and update our website (pages, content, basic UX improvements)



Ensure site speed, mobile optimization, and basic technical SEO hygiene



Implement landing pages or service pages that support local lead generation



SEO (Local & On-Page)



On-page SEO (titles, meta descriptions, headers, internal linking)



Local SEO focused on service areas



Keyword research with intent (calls & inquiries, not traffic for traffic’s sake)



Monitor rankings and make adjustments based on performance



Google Business Profile (GBP)



Optimize and manage Google Business Profile(s)



Weekly posts, photos, and updates



Review monitoring and response support



Track GBP insights and actions (calls, direction requests, clicks)



Digital & Phone Call Marketing



Support digital campaigns designed to generate phone calls, not just clicks



Assist with call tracking setup and basic reporting



Help optimize ads, landing pages, and messaging based on call quality



Coordinate simple follow-ups or workflows tied to inbound calls



Reporting & Accountability



Weekly reporting on:



Website performance



SEO progress



Google Business activity



Calls and inquiries generated



Flag what’s working, what’s not, and what needs fixing



What We’re Looking For



Required Skills & Experience



Proven experience managing:



Websites (WordPress or similar)



Local SEO



Google Business Profiles



Solid understanding of call-driven local marketing



Comfortable using tools like:



Google Search Console



Google Analytics



Call tracking tools



SEO tools (Ahrefs, SEMrush, or similar)



Strong attention to detail and follow-through



You’re a Good Fit If You:



Care more about results than buzzwords



Can execute without constant hand-holding



Think in systems, not random tasks



Are comfortable being measured on outcomes



Communicate clearly and honestly when something isn’t working



What This Is NOT



Not a “post on social media and hope” role



Not a branding or influencer role



Not a place for shortcuts, spammy SEO, or fake metrics



Work Details



Remote / Virtual



Part-time to start (with potential to grow)



Flexible hours, outcome-focused



Long-term opportunity for the right person



How to Apply



Please include:



A brief summary of your relevant experience



Examples of websites, SEO work, or Google Business Profiles you’ve managed



One short paragraph explaining how you help local businesses get more phone calls



Finally if you got this far, please add on the title line Gemini for me to get your attention.

title: Customer - Sales - Care consultant W/ RN required.
description:
join our mission to help seniors live longer, healthier, and happier lives at home.

We’re looking for a dynamic Customer Service Representative with a Registered Nurse (RN) license (Philippines) to support our Homecare Sales and Caregiver Recruitment Teams.



What You’ll Do



Be the first voice of compassion & professionalism when speaking with families exploring homecare services.



Handle pre-screened calls passed from our Care Coordinators, guiding families through their next steps.



Schedule consultations directly into our calendar system when clients are ready, and manage thoughtful follow-ups for those who need more time.



Support the team with customer service, marketing, sales support, scheduling, and recruitment coordination.



Learn and use tools such as WellSky Homecare, Google Workspace, and spreadsheets to keep everything organized and on track.



Assist with billing and payroll tasks as needed.



What We’re Looking For



Active Registered Nurse (Philippines license required).



Strong customer service and communication skills—you’ll be guiding clients with empathy and clarity.



Comfort with technology and software tools (Google Calendar, Sheets, Excel, CRMs, etc.).



A proactive, compassionate, and detail-oriented approach to work.



Someone who thrives in a supportive team environment and values long-term client relationships.



Why Join Us?



You’ll be making a real difference in families’ lives by helping seniors stay safe and independent at home.



Work with a supportive, purpose-driven team that values authenticity and care.



Immediate start for the right candidate.



To apply: Please complete your profile fully on Onlinejobs.ph prior to applying

In your application, use the subject line google

title: Telesales Agent — Retail & Liquor (Long-Term Contract)
description:
Telesales Agent (Retail / Liquor Focus) — Casual / Part-Time (Contract)

About the Role



We’re looking for a confident, driven Telesales Agent to support our growing retail and liquor programs across Australia.



This is a casual, part-time contract role designed to scale up or down depending on campaign requirements. You’ll be engaging directly with Australian retailers, supporting sell-in activity, driving ranging opportunities, and helping brands grow within independent retail channels.



Role Type



Casual / Part-Time Contract / Full-Time 



Flexible hours based on campaign demand



Ability to scale hours up or down as projects activate



Remote role



Key Responsibilities



Conduct outbound telesales calls to Australian retailers



Build relationships with store owners, managers, and buyers



Present and sell products clearly and confidently



Support distribution growth in independent retail



Provide clear call notes and updates



Work closely with sales and operations teams on live campaigns

Must have experience selling to Australian customers

If you want, I can also give you a high-performance “A-player attraction” version (the type that pulls hungry closers instead of generic call-centre applicants).

title: Graphic Designer (Part-time)
description:
We’re hiring a Graphic Designer with real estate experience who understands how to create clean, professional, high-converting visuals across digital and print.



This role is for someone who knows how to design with clarity and purpose. You understand branding, layout, hierarchy, and how visuals influence attention and trust, especially in real estate marketing.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Team Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important, and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just managing marketing campaigns for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have real estate design experience and understand what makes listings visually credible and market-ready? Do you know how to design social posts and brochures that look clean, professional, and on-brand without overcomplicating them? Do you move fast when timelines are tight and still pay attention to spacing, alignment, and small details?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Social & Digital Design

- Design YouTube branding assets including thumbnails, banners, and episode graphics.

- Create Instagram listing posts, announcements, ads, and story graphics.

- Develop and maintain branded social templates for consistent output.



Print Design

- Design real estate yard signs and signage.

- Create listing brochures and marketing flyers.

- Prepare clean, print-ready files with correct sizing and bleed settings.



Real Estate Photo Editing

- Edit listing photos for lighting, color correction, and clarity.

- Clean up images by removing distractions and enhancing presentation.

- Ensure final images look professional while remaining realistic.



Brand Consistency & Organization

- Maintain consistent fonts, colors, and layout standards

- Ensure all visuals align with company branding

- Organize design files clearly for future use



Requirements:

- Proven experience in real estate graphic design, required

- Strong portfolio showing real estate social and print work, required

- Experience with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom), or similar tools

- Strong understanding of layout, spacing, and visual hierarchy

- Experience preparing print-ready files

- Experience editing real estate photos

- Ability to work quickly without sacrificing quality

- Strong communication skills

- Ability to follow brand guidelines

- A stable, high-speed internet connection

- Growth mindset



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)

- Light motion graphics

- Understanding of social media performance metrics

- Basic copy awareness (headline spacing, readability, CTA placement)



NOTE: This is a part-time role with the opportunity to grow into a full-time position for the right person.



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.







STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $20-40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Graphic Designer with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: Graphic Designer (E-commerce Ads)
description:
We are looking for a Graphic Designer to create high-performing ads for our e-commerce brands (Beauty, Pet, Health, etc.).



You will not just make "pretty" images. You will find what is trending on social media and turn those trends into ads that make people click and buy.



Your Main Tasks:

Find Trends: Look at Pinterest, TikTok, and the
 Ad Library to find new, popular ad styles.



Create Static Ads: Make single images and "Carousel" ads (multiple sliding images) for Instagram and
.



Make Variations: Take one winning ad and make 5–10 different versions by changing the colors, the text, or the background.



Follow Brand Guidelines: Each brand has its own fonts and colors. You must follow these exactly so every ad looks professional.



Work with the Team: Listen to feedback from our marketing specialists to improve your designs based on how well they perform.



What we need from you:

Direct Response Experience: You know how to make ads that sell products (not just brand awareness).



Fast Tools: You are very fast and skilled using Canva, Photoshop, or Illustrator.



Different Styles: You can design for a "Luxury" brand one hour and a "Fun/High-Energy" brand the next.



Reliable: You can handle many tasks at once and always meet deadlines.



How to Apply:

1. Please review the examples on this link:

2. Please send your resume and a link to your "Top 10" best ads. 



Important: We want to see 10 examples of static or carousel ads that you think are the most "trending" or high-performing.

title: B2B Associate
description:
We’re growing the Sales team for the North American market and want you to be a part of that journey.

Are you looking for an adventure, one with big responsibility? Do you have experience working with resellers and distributors or international organizations and closing B2B product deals in the mid-market and enterprise space? Then you might be ready to become part of the team that drives BETTERWAY sky-high – worldwide.

Who are we? We are Betterway along with our sister company Beautifier LLC – We are vetted vendor for federal government of United States (CAGE 9PVP2) and also accredited supplier for the state of California, leveraging on our premier global supply chain and manufacturing capabilities with joint venture Lantern Science (Stock No. 831118) in personal care, consumable & health sectors, also strategic partnership alliance with fortune 500 manufacture conglomerate, which allow us to deliver high quality and cost effective product line in the field of home appliance, chemical, copper, metal and industrial related sectors, we have manufacturing facilities located in USA, China, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Turkey and many more other operation offices worldwide. 

As a associate of B2B Sales, you’ll be identifying, recruiting, and onboarding new partners primary in North America as well as closing business with our partners while achieving a high level of partner satisfaction. We don’t micromanage – we’re looking for an independent, flexible problem solver to join our best-in-class sales team.

What’s so cool about all this? You are joining one of the fastest growing start-up with Silicon Valley DNA – which means you’ll reap the glory of bringing us to the next stage and change the way the business world communicates. We don't believe in a complex hierarchy. We don’t do long approval processes. We just deliver. You will be joining a company with highly skilled, smart, and diverse people who are all overachievers and want to be “the best”.

As an associate of B2B Operation you will:

?Thrive in a fast-paced, start-up environment and has a proven track record of achieving robust sales results

?Able to work in the U.S.A time zone, and capable to travel domestically and internationally

?Eager to learn and understand the new market trends and follow it closely

?Bachelor’s degree and/or 3+ years of direct sales management experience within the industrial or consumer staples goods industry

?3+ years of experience leading strategic sales organization, including

?Building and growing B2B and B2C sales channels,

?Building and growing distribution partnerships globally,

?Attracting, developing, and retaining a diverse high-performing sales team that consistently achieves outstanding results

?Implementing and utilizing data-driven analytics and CRM to develop strategy and manage sales tasks, pipeline, and closing data

?Understands  different markets the product is sold in; Industrial, Supermarket, and Government, and is confident in selling across them within the United States and abroad

?Knowledge of sales operations with a focus on continuous improvement

?High attention to detail

?Strategic thinker with ability to execute tactically

?Excellent written and verbal communication skills Unwavering customer focus

?Data driven, process-oriented thinker

?Exercising sound judgment in analyzing and solving problems from multiple, diverse perspectives

?Believes in and supports Betterway’s mission, vision, and values

?Understands and is compassionate about different populations, cultures, and needs

Hiring Process?

If you are interested in this opportunity, please:1, Send your resume to 
 , we will notice you for the interview if there is a potential fit; 2,personal statement indicates why do you think that you are a good fit for this role 3, Interviews by invitation only primarily conducted in English, partially in Chinese might be possible.

What we offer you?

This is a fully remote position, that means you can work from home or when on the go, we offer you the maximum flexibility in exchange for your contribution and performance. The salary for this position will be commensurate with your experience and include an attractive bonus package plus stock option and benefits. All of your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: INSTAGRAM APPOINTMENT SETTER
description:
HIRING: Instagram Appointment Setter + Notion CRM Builder (Remote)



Select PDR is hiring a sharp, organized Instagram Appointment Setter who can also help us build and manage a simple Notion-based CRM to track leads, follow-ups, and booked appointments.



This role is for someone who can turn DMs into scheduled customers and keep everything structured behind the scenes.



We are a fast-growing mobile Paintless Dent Repair company in Texas helping customers remove dents and hail damage without repainting — clean, fast, factory-quality repairs.



Your job is to:

 1. Respond to Instagram leads

 2. Book appointments

 3. Organize everything in Notion



You will help build a system where no lead gets lost.



? Responsibilities



Instagram Appointment Setting

 • Respond to inbound DMs quickly

 • Follow up with leads daily

 • Ask qualifying questions (damage, location, insurance, timeline)

 • Book appointments into our calendar

 • Maintain a friendly, confident tone



Notion CRM Management

 • Build and manage a lead tracker inside Notion

 • Track lead status (New ? Follow-up ? Booked ? Closed)

 • Log customer info + conversation notes

 • Create a simple pipeline/dashboard for daily follow-ups

 • Keep everything clean and organized



?



???? Ideal Candidate

 • Experience with appointment setting or DM sales

 • Strong written English (Spanish is a plus)

 • Comfortable building systems in Notion

 • Extremely organized and consistent

 • Understands follow-up = money

 • Available during business hours (Texas time preferred)



?



???? Tools You’ll Use

 • Instagram DM Inbox

 • Notion (CRM + pipeline tracking)

 • Google Calendar

 • Scripts + training provided



?



???? Compensation



Hourly + bonuses based on appointments booked and pipeline performance.



? $3–$5 per qualified appointment booked

(lead gives info + confirms time+shows up)



? $50–$150 monthly bonus for hitting volume goals:

 • 20 appointments/month = +$50

 • 35 appointments/month = +$100

 • 50+ appointments/month = +$150



?



???? How to Apply



Send:

 1. A short intro

 2. Any experience with IG appointment setting

 3. A screenshot or example of a Notion workspace you’ve built (if available)

 4. Your weekly availability

 5. Why you’d be a great fit for Select PDR

title: Innovatory Management System Development  (Full stack developer needed)
description:
JOB PAYS $700 + 200 IF DONE (FULLY COMPLETE!) IN 7 DAYS.  THE PRICE GOES DOWN $100 A DAY FOR EVERY DAY AFTER 10 DAYS!!!!  Include your GitHub in your response.  Also include the name of an airplane in your subject line, if you do not do these two things you will be disqualified.





Seeking an experienced FULL STACK DEVELOPER to build out a Fully integrated Innovatory Management System (IMS) that will integrate SEAMLESSLY into our multi vendor marketplace and create active listings.  



Looking for a full stack developer to build out an Innovatory Management System.  





Backend



1. Automatic integration with all parts, aircraft, & engines to to website.



2. All vendors parts, aircraft, & engines (conditions, list price, sales price, should all filter into website database for historical data                                                    for parts, aircraft, & engines price models)





Customer Facing



1. Price range for parts

     • Price range should be based on historical pricing as well as on current market supply - plus possible other reliable sources like historical data from averf or something like that.



2. Current total inventory of available parts on market

     • Inventory should pull from backends of all part houses using our software - plus possible other reliable sources



3. EASY UPLOAD OF INVENTORY

     • The customer should be able to upload a CSV, PDF, EXCEL, PAGES… file with partial information that will accurately upload     correct parts, aircraft, & engines to IMS)

     • Should match parts, aircraft & engines with our datable and pull data from there when able.

     • Required Parts info - Part #, Condition (But should recognize other columns)

     • Required Aircraft info - Aircraft designator (But should recognize other columns)

     • Required Engine info - Engine Model (But should recognize other columns)

     • Should prompt other information in popup in and after the upload

     • Should use AI to pull in stock images for parts, aircraft & engines (if after prompting they d
 there are no images for those products and asked to yes supply stock images for these parts, aircraft & engines)



4. Some type of mobile app for quick uploads

     • The customer should be able to upload a CSV, PDF, EXCEL, PAGES… file with partial information that will accurately upload correct parts, aircraft, & engines to IMS from phone, or tablet.

     • Customer should be able to add individual entries of parts, aircraft & engines.

     • New Part would have - All boxes from website (Camera and device image upload)

     • New Aircraft would have - All boxes from website (Camera and device image upload)

     • New Engine would have - All boxes from website (Camera and device image upload)

title: Remote Home Care Recruiter – Full Recruitment System Owner
description:
We are a licensed home care agency serving seniors in Minnesota. We hire caregivers who allow older adults to remain independent in their homes.



We are looking for a full-time remote recruiter who will own the entire caregiver recruitment system from start to finish.



This is not a resume-reviewing role.

This is a systems role.



You will:

Forecast hiring needs by geographic area

Manage job postings and applicant flow

Answer incoming applicant phone calls

Screen and qualify candidates

Track pipeline metrics

Ensure we never run short on caregivers in key service areas

You will work directly with leadership, scheduling and HR.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Recruitment System Ownership

Maintain and improve our caregiver recruiting pipeline

Track KPIs: applicants per week, interviews scheduled, hires, cost per hire

Keep weekly recruiting dashboard updated

Identify bottlenecks and fix them



2. Applicant Handling

title: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist
description:
Now Hiring: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist

Remote Position | Long-Term Opportunity

Are you an experienced, detail-oriented writer with a strong commitment to producing measurable media results? Are you seeking a stable remote role with long-term growth potential—one that rewards high-quality, publication-ready content and the ability to build strong journalist relationships?

SimplyMedia is seeking a highly skilled Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist to join our expanding team. We are looking for a professional who understands editorial standards and can consistently deliver fast, compelling, and quotable pitches in response to media queries (HARO, Featured, etc.) while cultivating positive journalist relationships.

A writing background and portfolio/sample submissions are required.



What You’ll Receive

* Starting Pay: $450 per month

* Performance Bonuses: Top-performing specialists can advance from $450 to up to $1,000 per month in under six months by meeting our quality and speed KPIs (details provided upon hire).

* Paid Holidays (Philippine Official Holidays) & Paid Time Off: Available after regularization based on consistent, excellent performance.

* Targeted Training Provided: We will train you in our outreach tools and strategies; you must bring the foundational writing ability.

* Annual Bonuses for high-performing tea
mbers.



Who We’re Looking For

* Non-Negotiable: Proven writing experience (1+ years preferred) with the ability to submit a portfolio or relevant writing samples (e.g., media pitches, articles, marketing copy).

* Exceptional Writing Ability: Superb command of written English, strong grammar, and excellent editorial judgment. All outputs must be publication-ready.

* Relationship-Oriented Professional: Experience communicating politely and professionally, with the ability to build long-term rapport with journalists.

* Strategic Thinker: Understanding of media relations, PR strategy, or SEO link building is a significant advantage. You should know how to pitch a compelling angle—not just promote a company.

* Fast, Focused, and Reliable: Ability to respond quickly and deliver high-quality content under tight deadlines (e.g., targeting submission within the first 50 responses).



Key Responsibilities

As a Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist, your primary focus will be generating media coverage through expert communication and strong relationship management:

* Craft Quotable Pitches: Write clear, concise, expert-level responses with strong soundbites and quotable insights reporters can use immediately.

* Strategic Outreach & Follow-Up: Manage query platforms (HARO, Featured, etc.), ensuring fast submissions and timely, professional follow-ups to build journalist relationships.

* Communication Management: Organize, research, and respond to media correspondence with clarity, professionalism, and a focus on maintaining positive rapport.

This is a long-term, fully remote position focused on content quality, measurable media outcomes, and professional relationship building.?Regularization to permanent status is based on consistently excellent performance.



If You’re a Dependable, Skilled Writer Who Thrives Under Pressure—We Want to Hear from You

Multiple positions available. 



Leave us a message first, then apply here:

title: Amazon PPC Manager - PPC Specialist for EU + UK Marketplace - 5 product categoreis
description:
We’re a fast-growing eCommerce brand with our own warehouse and factory in the Netherlands. 2-3x year on year growth for 5 years straight with 100k+ customers.



We sell houseplant-specific products across Europe and are now scaling our Amazon EU + UK hard.



Amazon is a new & critical growth channel for us, and we’re looking for someone to take full ownership of the advertising. We have proven D2C success & promising early traction on Amazon.



Our Mission

At Sybotanica, a small, high-growth startup, we wake up every day to make plants happy! To do that, we need to act fast, take ownership, and take pride in our work as a team.

If we succeed, we’ll become Europe’s #1 houseplant brand, and we’ll know we’ve made it when we can proudly call 500,000 plant lovers our customers.

You will be working closely with the founder & our supply chain team and the rest of our 20-person team (including 10 PH-based employees).



Working Hours: available during EU business hours (08:00–17:00 Amsterdam time), is midday / evening PH hours. 





What You’ll Be Responsible For



You own the Amazon P&L and are responsible for the ad performance.

1. Advertising / PPC (Amazon Ads)

- Build and manage Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display campaigns for our 4 main product categories across 5 countries.

- Set up campaign structure, keyword research, negative keyword pruning

- Daily optimization: bid adjustments, search term reports, ACOS/TACOS monitoring

- Budget allocation per country and per SKU



2. Ad-hoc catalogue management

- Since amazon is a new channel, you will manage catalogue management in collaboration with our supply team for the time being.



(Note: Inventory & supply chain is owned by our Supply Chain Manager, you will coordinate, not own this)



Requirements (Read Carefully, No Exceptions)

- Amazon marketplace experience is a must, D2C brand experience strongly preferred

- Proof required, don’t just claim experience, show it.

- You’re excited to work in a fast-moving, remote-friendly team where ownership and initiative are valued.



Perks & Benefits

- 13th-month pay (pro-rated if yearly)

- Flexible work hours (parttime also possible)

- Raises based on KPI targets every 6–12 months

- 20 paid leave days per year

- Real-life team events with our PH team!

- Innovative company, AI-Integrated.

- Supportive and collaborative team environment! 





How to Apply

- Send a short message explaining:

- The proof outlined above. The more the better.

- A time you solved a tough Amazon challenge, the more details the better

- Detailed specifications of size of Amazon account(s) handled, annual revenue, adspend, which marketplaces, what parts you were responsible for + results you delivered.

- Your CV in .PDF

- What motivates you





Add “lets gro w” so I know you read the whole thing. Also add a ????somewhere.

description:

We are dedicated to helping improve the lives of people all over the world.

At IMPACT BRANDS, we embrace remote work culture and cherish open-mindedness, high energy, and adaptability qualities that are essential in our dynamic environment. We prioritize the growth of every tea
mber, regardless of their location, offering advancement from intern to leadership roles.



IMPACT BRANDS has already positively impacted the lives of 3 million people worldwide. Join us as a remote Outbound Sales Representative and let’s impact billions together!



Our Treats:

- Welcome Gift. Experience a warm welcome with our exclusive present designed just for you.

- Remote work. We are a fully remote organization, allowing you to work from any location.

- More free time. Enjoy 15+ Working Days of Holidays to recharge and relax from work.

- Internet subsidy. To ensure seamless communication and access to remote work we will assist you with an additional budget for high-speed internet.

- Health and wellness budget. We value your well-being - investment in your health is not just encouraged but actively supported.

- Birthday Gift. Celebrate your special day with additional time-off.

- Team spirit. Enjoy regular team-building activities and engaging online events.

- Professional growth. Exceptional performance is recognized and rewarded, offering opportunities for career advancement based on your contributions to our success.

- Volunteering. Embrace the opportunity to dedicate 2 paid days each year towards personal growth and community impact.

- Permanent contract. Enjoy stability with long-term growth opportunities.

- Global flatwork culture. The chance to influence the company right from the start and foster collaboration across borders.

- A whole bunch of other benefits.



Bits of your job:

- Perform a high volume of outbound sales calls to customers to interact with them and identify their needs or issues

- Clarify information and provide recommendations and solutions to customers via telephone calls

- Build positive work relationships with customers to enhance the image and public perception of a company

- Strive to improve customer satisfaction through excellent customer service

- Place outbound calls to customers to promote new products and services

- Obtain and evaluate all relevant data to handle complaints and inquiries

- Keep a high level of knowledge about existing products and services

- And other tasks



Key expectations:

- Previous experience in B2C Sales, including managing outbound and cold call functions

- Medical or healthcare industry experience would be considered a plus

- Strong phone presence with exemplary customer service and sales skills

- Excellent communication skills with active listening

- Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types

- Strong problem-solving and excellent interpersonal skills

- Ability to multi-task, set priorities, and manage time effectively

- Ability to handle stressful situations appropriately

- Excellent written and verbal English language skills

- Proficient in relevant computer applications



Base salary of $500-$750 per month, plus commission based on performance, with potential earnings of $1300+ per month.

title: Architectural CAD Draftsperson- Specialising in Kitchens/Bathrooms/Custom Joinery
description:
Premium Australian BPO is seeking an experienced Architectural CAD Draftsperson, for our client an Australian Designer/Builder Firm that specializes in custom kitchens, joinery and bathrooms. 



This FT (Full-Time) role offers the flexibility of WFH (Working-from-home) a market leading salary package including paid leave + bonuses. Work Australian business hours 9am-5.30pm AEST. 



Be a key player on a dynamic team and fast-track your career development in the Australian market. 



We’re looking for a CAD Draftsperson to support the design and construction team by producing accurate, detailed drawings for kitchens, custom joinery and bathrooms. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys translating concepts into clear, build-ready plans and working closely with designers, installers and trades.





Key Responsibilities Include



- Preparing detailed CAD drawings for kitchens, joinery and bathrooms. 

- Developing SketchUP models from design concepts and site measurements.

- Updating and amending drawings throughout the project lifecycle. 

- Ensuring drawings align with design intent, specifications and build requirements. 

- Communicate and collaborate with designers, installers and trades to resolve drawing queries.



Key Requirements MUST HAVES Include



- EXPERT level proficiency with SketchUP. 

- Proven experience 2+ years drafting kitchens, joinery and bathrooms specifically. 

- High attention to detail and accuracy. 

- Ability to manage multiple projects, working efficiently to timelines and deadlines. 

- Excellent communication skills and ability to cross-collaborate with multiple stakeholders and tea
mbers. 

- Excellent proficiency in English both verbal and written. 



IDEAL candidates have

- Previous experience working with Australian clients/Architecture firms. 

- An understanding of Australian building standards/codes particularly for joinery construction. 





This role requires applicants have a complete WFH set up in place. Please include information about your set-up, including



- Hardware (Laptop/Monitor/Headset).

- Internet Options (Primary and Secondary- back-up options).

- Back-Up Power Options (Generator/Power bank).

- Closest Co-Working Space (Travel time from home). 



 

Please include in your application:

- Your CV.

- Your portfolio with samples of your best work (relevant to this role). 

- A short summation of your relevant experience for this role.

We are looking for an experienced Operations Coordinator to support our CS and Operations Team. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and experience across key e-commerce and operational platforms.



ABOUT US

At Chamelo, we believe that your glasses should be as flexible and adaptable as you are. With our proprietary Chamelo Lens Technology and innovative tint technologies, Chamelo is redefining what eyewear can do—offering you the ultimate in comfort, style, and personal expression.

What We Offer

title: Sales Administration Support
description:
Work remotely | Full Time | Full training provided |



We’re hiring a high-output, high performing, natural admin talent to join the team as Sales Administration Support to be our admin and operations help behind our busy, high performing sales team.



Dale Carnegie is one of the world’s most recognised names in professional training, helping people and businesses unlock their potential in over 90 countries. We’re now looking for a highly organised, tech-savvy Virtual Assistant who can work at a fast pace, think ahead, and bring a keen eye for detail to everything they do.



This role is perfect for someone who’s resourceful, eager to learn, and excited by variety. You’ll have the opportunity to get to know our world-class training programs and understand our clients’ needs.



What You’ll Do:

You’ll work closely with our sales team, supervised by an experienced Sales Support & Ops Administrator, across a wide range of administration tasks to support both our government and commercial clients including:

- Client Database & CRM Management

s

s aligned with upcoming events.

• Monitor registrations and provide timely reports, including updates to the client lead database.

Non Negotiables:

title: Appointment setter/GHL/VA
description:
Role Summary: We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Hybrid Setter & Tech Onboarding Specialist to join our fast-growing marketing agency. This is not a standard virtual assistant role. You will be a critical operator on our team, responsible for owning the entire front-end of our client journey, from the first contact with a new lead to their complete technical onboarding.The ideal candidate is a rare blend of a fast, confident salesperson and a sharp, detail-oriented technical specialist. You are someone who is not afraid to pick up the phone and call a new lead within minutes, while also being completely comfortable navigating the back-end of GoHighLevel and Meta Business Manager. If you thrive in a role that combines speed, technology, and client communication, this is the perfect opportunity for you.



What You Will Do: 

Your responsibilities will be divided into four core areas:

Speed-to-Lead & Appointment Setting: You will be the first line of offense for all new business. Your primary mission is to call and SMS every new inbound lead within 5 minutes of their inquiry. The goal is to qualify them quickly and book them into a sales appointment on our calendar. You must be relentless, persuasive, and confident on the phone.

2.GoHighLevel (GHL) Onboarding & Integration: You will take full ownership of the technical setup for our new clients within GoHighLevel. This includes spinning up new sub-accounts, building out funnels from templates, configuring calendars and forms, creating automation workflows and triggers, and ensuring all necessary integrations are functioning perfectly.

3.Weekly Client Reporting: You will be the face of our agency for weekly client updates. You will be responsible for pulling performance data directly from GHL, preparing a concise summary, and leading a 15-minute weekly status meeting with each client to present the results calmly and professionally.

4.Meta Business Manager Onboarding: You will manage the critical first steps of client setup on the advertising side. This involves confidently guiding clients through the process of granting access to their Meta Business Manager, connecting their
 Page and Ad Account, verifying their domain, and successfully installing the Meta Pixel with the Conversions API.

Who We Are Looking For•A GoHighLevel Power User: You have demonstrable, hands-on experience building funnels, creating complex workflows, and managing sub-accounts in GHL. You can troubleshoot common issues without handholding.•A Confident Salesperson: You are fearless on the phone and have experience in a role that required outbound calling or appointment setting. You can handle objections gracefully and maintain control of a conversation.•A Meta Business Manager Pro: You are comfortable navigating the backend of Meta Business Manager and have experience with the technical side of onboarding, including Pixel installation and domain verification.•An Excellent Communicator: You have fluent and professional English communication skills, both written and verbal. You can explain technical details simply and present reports to clients with confidence.•A Reliable Operator: You are process-driven, highly organized, and can work independently in a remote setting. You have a quiet workspace, a stable high-speed internet connection (with a backup), and a quality noise-canceling headset.



Job starts at $8usd an hour with potential for full time employment and quarterly raises based on performance.

title: customer service manager (High-Performance / KPI-Driven)
description:
Location: Remote or Chamelo HQ

Reports To: COO

Department: Customer Experience



About Chamelo

Chamelo is a celebrity-backed brand growing triple digits. We bootstrapped our way to 8-figures and are about to close a VC round with the goal to accelerate growth toward an IPO.

At Chamelo, we’re engineering a new era of smart eyewear by combining state-of-the-art technology with cutting-edge style. Our mission goes beyond creating dynamic and stylish glasses—we’re pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in a traditionally static industry.

Our eyewear isn’t just functional—it’s bold, customizable, and effortlessly cool. Backed by iconic figures like Shaquille O’Neal and Bad Bunny, Chamelo is on pace for rapid expansion, offering an exciting opportunity to be part of our growth story.



About the Role

We are seeking a world-class, KPI-obsessed Customer Experience Manager to lead and scale Chamelo’s global support operations. This role is designed for a performance-driven operator who can build a premium, data-backed customer experience that matches the speed and ambition of our growth.

You will own the full CX performance engine — from SLA management and QA frameworks to agent productivity, automation strategy, and customer satisfaction metrics. This is not a traditional support role; this is a leadership position focused on speed, efficiency, quality, and continuous optimization.

The ideal candidate thrives in a high-growth ecommerce environment, has deep experience managing remote teams, and uses data to drive decisions, coaching, and process improvements.





Key Responsibilities

KPI Ownership & Performance Management

Own and manage all CX performance metrics including:

First Response Time (FRT)

Resolution Time (TAT)

CSAT & Customer Satisfaction trends

Quality Assurance (QA) scores

Ticket volume & contact rate

Agent productivity & utilization

SLA adherence

Build real-time dashboards and performance reporting for leadership.

Establish weekly and monthly performance reviews with clear action plans.

Forecast support demand and align staffing models accordingly.

Team Leadership & Coaching

Lead, mentor, and scale a high-performing global remote support team.

Implement structured coaching, scorecards, and performance improvement plans.

Create a culture of accountability, speed, and customer obsession.

Drive hiring, onboarding, and continuous training programs.

CX Strategy & Process Optimization

Design and implement scalable workflows and automation to reduce ticket volume.

Optimize help center, macros, AI/chat automation, and self-service adoption.

Continuously improve customer journey and reduce friction points.

Partner with Operations and Supply Chain to eliminate root causes of customer issues.

Premium Customer Experience Delivery

Ensure every interaction reflects a high-end, brand-aligned experience.

Handle VIP and escalated cases with a white-glove approach.

Develop playbooks for high-value customers, wholesale partners, and influencers.

Cross-Functional Impact

Turn customer insights into actionable recommendations for Product, Logistics, and Sales.

Identify trends in returns, defects, shipping delays, and product feedback.

Support product launches and peak season readiness planning.



Qualifications

5+ years leading customer support or customer experience teams in high-growth ecommerce or consumer brands.

Proven track record of managing CX through KPIs and data dashboards.

Experience with helpdesk platforms (e.g., Gorgias, Zendesk, Freshdesk or similar).

Strong background in remote team leadership and performance management.

Advanced analytical and problem-solving skills.

Deep understanding of SLAs, workforce planning, and QA frameworks.

Exceptional communication and leadership presence.

Experience supporting a premium or high-ticket product is a strong advantage.



What We Offer

Competitive above-market salary.

Paid time off and paid holidays.

13th month pay.

Regular performance bonus tied to CX performance metrics.

Annual salary bonus/increases based on performance.

Remote-friendly work environment.

Fun and collaborative culture with team contests.



Application Process

Please send your resume and answers to the following questions to 

Subject Line: “CX Rockstar!”

Application Questions

If you could be one famous entrepreneur (alive or dead), who would you be and why?

One paragraph (5 sentences max) on your most KPI-driven CX leadership experience.

What CX metrics do you believe matter most and why?

What are your key strengths as a leader?

What are your weaknesses?

Your desired number of weekly hours & desired start date.

Your availability next week for a quick chat.



Equal Opportunity

Chamelo is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

description:
About the Company:



Since 2009, the ISBX PH team has developed numerous websites and applications for clients large and small that include automotive, consumer packaged goods, action sports, and lifestyle markets. We stand by our work and can provide a long list of references from our trusted partners.



Our team is highly collaborative and passionate who strive to deliver great service and quality applications to our clients.

title: Job Opportunity: Long-Term Employment with Growing Insurance Supplement Company
description:
Are you looking for a stable, long-term position where attention to detail and expertise are highly valued? We are seeking a dedicated individual with experience in Xactimate and a solid understanding of roofing components.

About Us: We are an insurance supplement company that partners with roofing contractors to assist in supplementing their insurance jobs. Our work involves reviewing photos of roofs, analyzing the original estimates, and creating detailed supplements that include necessary additions for rebuilding, supported by citing code and providing photo justification.



Key Responsibilities:

• Analyze roofing photos and original estimates to identify missing or required line items.

• Create detailed and accurate supplements using Xactimate.

• Communicate primarily via
 with insurance companies, and occasionally speak directly with adjusters to justify the inclusion of certain line items.

• Maintain a high level of detail and accuracy in all communications and reports.



Requirements:

• Proficiency in Xactimate and an understanding of roofing components.

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

• Ability to work night shifts (9 AM - 5 PM ET).

• A keen eye for detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.

• Willingness to adapt and grow with a rapidly expanding company.



What We Offer:

• A chance to be part of a small but fast-growing company with significant opportunities for advancement.

• A supportive work environment that values hard work, dedication, and continuous improvement.

• A role that will challenge you, with the potential for professional growth and career development.





We are looking to hire 3-4 estimators in December. 



If you’re up for the challenge and ready to contribute to our team's success, we encourage you to apply. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone who is looking to grow with us and make a meaningful impact in the insurance supplement industry.

title: SEO Content Writer & Blog Publisher (Manual Writing, AI-Assisted)
description:
I’m looking for a long-term SEO blog writer to manage weekly or bi-weekly blog posts across 5 websites. This is steady work.



Important: Blogs cannot be fully AI-written. AI tools can be used to assist with outlining or research, but the final article must be primarily human-written. All posts will be run through multiple AI detection tools before publishing.



If you rely entirely on AI to generate content, this role is not a fit.



What You’ll Do

– Write weekly or bi-weekly SEO blog posts

– Research and suggest original topics (no duplicates)

– Naturally include provided keywords

– Use tools like AnswerThePublic for topic inspiration

– Generate blog images using Freepik descriptions and AI image tools

– Log into WordPress and manually publish posts

– Properly format content (H1, H2, spacing, internal links, images, meta description, etc.)

– Follow on-page SEO best practices

– Run content through AI detectors before submission

– Track hours accurately



What I Provide

– Keyword lists

– Topic inspiration from research tools

– Clear formatting standards

– Ongoing, consistent work



Requirements

– Strong English writing skills

– Proven SEO writing experience

– Experience publishing directly in WordPress

– Comfortable using AI tools responsibly (not fully AI writing)

– Detail-oriented with formatting

– Reliable internet and ability to use time tracking software



Compensation

– Hourly pay (not per article)

– Must use time tracking

– Long-term opportunity for the right person





To apply please provide



-2–3 SEO blog posts you personally wrote

-Your hourly rate

-A short explanation of your writing process (do not use AI for this answer)



Applications without writing samples will not be considered.

title: B2B Lead Research Specialist – U.S. Business Owners
description:
About Us



We are a fast-growing U.S.-based AI automation agency serving established local businesses across industries such as HVAC, Med Spas, Roofing, Contractors, Barbershops, and more.



We operate with high standards, strong accountability, and performance-driven expectations. We are building a disciplined, long-term team of professionals who take ownership of their work.



If you are fast, accurate, highly organized, and take pride in precision research, this role is for you.



Your Mission



Your responsibility is to research and deliver verified contact information for real U.S. business owners.



We require decision-makers only.



Not managers.

Not assistants.

Not generic
s.



Your work directly impacts company revenue and growth.



Responsibilities



You will:



- Research targeted U.S. local businesses in assigned niches and cities

- Identify the true business owner

- Collect and verify the following information:

  - Owner full name

  - Owner verified
 (must pass verification tools)

  - Direct owner phone number (if available)

  - Business phone

  - Business

  - Website

  - Business address

- Deliver clean, organized Google Sheets daily

- Maintain strict accuracy standards



Performance Standards



- Minimum: 200 verified leads per day

- Accuracy requirement: 95% or higher

-
s must pass verification tools

- No fake data

- No guessing

- No duplicates

- No large corporations



Leads that are incorrect, unverified, or inaccurate will not count toward your daily total.



This role requires efficiency and the use of professional data tools. Manual-only research will not meet daily targets.



Required Skills and Tools



You must have experience with:



- Apollo

- LinkedIn Sales Navigator

- Google Maps research

- Outscraper

-
 verification tools

- Data scraping and bulk research systems



Experience working with U.S. marketing or AI agencies is a strong advantage.



Work Structure



- 4–8 hours per day

- Long-term opportunity

- Direct communication with agency owner

- Weekly performance reviews

- Opportunity for growth into data operations or team lead roles



Compensation



- $3–$5 per hour depending on experience

- Performance bonuses for exceeding daily targets while maintaining accuracy

Top performers will receive increased hours and higher pay.



How to Apply

- A short summary of your lead generation experience

- The tools you use

- 2–3 sample leads you have previously researched



Start your message with the word: Elite

title: Marketing Executive
description:
JOB TYPE: Full-Time



JOB SUMMARY:

We are seeking a client-focused Marketing Executive with strong expertise in AI-based marketing tools and CRM platforms to support lead generation, client communication, and campaign execution for the US market. The ideal candidate will be comfortable working directly with clients, generating qualified leads, preparing presentations, making cold calls and managing professional
 outreach and follow-ups. This role requires a balance of strategic thinking, hands-on execution, and client engagement, aligned with US business and communication standards. 



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Serve as a client-facing marketing professional, understanding client goals and aligning marketing strategies accordingly. 

Leverage AI-powered marketing tools to generate, qualify, and nurture leads across digital channels. 

Prepare and deliver professional presentations, proposals, and marketing decks for client meetings and internal reviews. 

Manage end-to-end lead generation activities, including prospecting, outreach, and follow-up. 

Draft, send, and track professional
 campaigns and follow-up communications with prospects and clients. 

Utilize CRM tools (such as Salesforce, Zoho CRM, HubSpot, or similar) to manage leads, track interactions, and maintain accurate client records. 

Monitor campaign performance and generate insights using analytics and AI-driven reporting tools. 

Collaborate with internal teams to ensure timely execution of marketing initiatives and client deliverables. 

Maintain clear documentation of leads, communications, and campaign outcomes. 



REQUIRED SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field. 

2–5 years of experience in marketing, lead generation, or client-facing roles, preferably supporting the US market. 

Excellent knowledge and hands-on experience with AI-based marketing and lead generation tools. 

Strong experience using CRM platforms such as Salesforce, Zoho CRM, HubSpot, or similar tools. 

Proven ability to generate and manage leads, including follow-ups and pipeline tracking. 

Strong experience in writing professional
s and follow-up messages aligned with US business communication standards. 

Proficiency in preparing presentations and reports (PowerPoint, Google Slides, or similar). 

Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. 

Strong organizational, time-management, and client-handling skills. 



PREFERRED SKILLS:

Experience working with US-based clients or US marketing campaigns 

Familiarity with marketing automation and
 marketing platforms 

Data-driven mindset with the ability to interpret insights and optimize strategies 



WHY JOIN US:

Opportunity to work on US-focused marketing initiatives 

Hands-on exposure to advanced AI marketing and CRM tools 

Collaborative, growth-oriented work environment 

Direct client interaction and ownership of marketing outcomes



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS (Important):

Attach your updated resume

Subject line must be formatted exactly as: Last Name, First Name – Marketing Executive

Only 10 application points will be accepted

Applications that do not follow these instructions will be disregarded

title: Senior Meta Ads Media Buyer – $600K/Month Spend – Performance Only
description:
We are currently spending $600,000 per month on Meta Ads and scaling aggressively.

We are not a beginner brand. We are not testing with $50/day budgets.



We move fast. We test fast. We scale fast.



If you are looking for a “stable 9–5 marketing role” or a company that moves slowly and cautiously — this is not for you.



Read This Carefully Before Applying



We do not care about:

- Whether the product is white, grey, or black

- Whether it’s “ethical enough” for your personal beliefs



We care about one thing:



- Performance. ROI. Scale.

- If you are strongly opinion-driven about product categories or morality in advertising, do not apply.

- If you are driven by numbers, performance, and growth — keep reading.



What We Need



A killer Meta Ads media buyer who:

- Has managed $100K+/month budgets minimum (proof required)

- Understands scaling structures (CBO, ABO, ASC, cost caps, bid caps)

- Knows how to scale aggressively without crashing accounts

- Understands creatives testing at scale

- Thinks in data, not emotions

- Can operate independently without hand-holding

- You must be comfortable working in high-risk, high-speed environments.



What You’ll Be Responsible For:

You are not just managing campaigns.

You are building and running the performance department.

You will build and lead:

1 Junior Media Buyer

1 Creative Strategist

1 Data / Reporting Assistant



Strategic Ownership:

- Full responsibility for Meta performance at ~$600K/month spend

- Designing and evolving the scaling structure

- Protecting MER and blended profitability

- Managing performance during aggressive growth phases



You own results.



Team Leadership & Development:

Directly manage the Junior Media Buyer

Direct creative direction through the Creative Strategist

Oversee reporting accuracy via the Data Assistant

Create SOPs and workflows

Improve team efficiency



As we scale, you will:



Identify gaps in the team

Define new roles when needed

Participate in hiring decisions

Help build a high-performance performance department



You are expected to think like a Head of Performance, not just a buyer.



No babysitting.

No “let’s wait 7 days for learning phase.”

No excuses.



DO NOT APPLY:

Beginners

Agency account managers 

Ethical purists uncomfortable with aggressive scaling

People who need constant direction

People who blame the algorithm for everything



Compensation:

We pay well for killers.

Base salary (depending on experience)

Performance bonus tied to scale & profitability

Long-term opportunity for serious operators

If you make us money, you will make a lot of money.



Reporting & Communication:



Daily and weekly executive-level performance summary

Clear action plans

No vanity metrics

No excuses



Application Instructions (IMPORTANT)

To avoid wasting time, follow these steps exactly. Applications that do not follow instructions will be ignored.



Start your application with:

“I manage at least $100K/month.”

Attach screenshots clearly showing:

- Monthly spend

- ROAS

- Revenue generated



Briefly explain:

- Your biggest scaling win

-Your biggest failure and what you learned



Confirm clearly that you are comfortable working with any product category.



Record a 2–3 minute video introduction (REQUIRED).

No edited agency showreels. Just you speaking directly.

We want to see clarity, confidence, and competence.

title: Long-term Implementor Opportunity | Custom Shopify Store Development
description:

Who we are looking for: An independent contractor, non affiliated with an agency, who is looking for 40 hour full-time work weeks with significant expertise with custom Shopify stores and development, proficient in building scalable and dynamic liquid code with JavaScript.



Responsibilities:

- You will be working hand-in-hand with our marketing director who will provide briefs on what exactly to change and how we will do it. It is your job to think of best coding practices, scalability, modular, and dependability of code.

- Joining meetings anywhere from 9am to 5pm EST to communicate about vision and needs on a weekly basis.

- Reporting directly to our marketing director.

- Bug-free and thoroughly tested features.

- Documentation for all changes made.



Prerequisites:

- Available from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday.

- Proficient in English.

- Proficient in Shopify stores and apps.

- Proficient in CRO technology (
, GA4)

- Proficient in Liquid code and others.

- Hours will be tracked through Upwork, with screen-sharing turned on.

- Slack and
 reachability.

- During business hours, reply 2 hours after initial request.

- Follows instructions to the tea.

- From stage 2 onwards, you will become full-time. Work other than Arc Grove is prohibited.

- Performance (site-load) considerations.

- Scalability notes for future.



How things will work:

1. Meeting to go over expectations of deliverable and timeline.

2. implementation of what's needed.

3. Communication of what is done during business hours.

4. Meeting to go over what is done and pushing live.



Stages:



Stage 1: Current Project Scope - 2 week prohibitionary period

Hours: 80 hours, 40 hours a week, 9am-5pm est availability.

Hourly wage: $7/hr

Delivery time: 2 weeks from start.

Information: You will be provided a brief of what needs to be changed. Respond with considerations of how and what needs to be done, any gaps in knowledge that you need to know in order to implement. Before starting, documentation of current website will be provided to you.



Stage 2: Implementation Tea
mber

Hours: 80 hours, 40 hours a week, 9am-5pm est availability.

Hourly wage: $9/hr

Start date: Immediately after stage 1 considering deliverable is as asked for.

Information: This stage of collaboration will look like the 2 week probationary period, just a bigger scope and more projects.



Stage 3: Conversion rate optimization + Implementation Tea
mber

Horus: 80 hours, 40 hours a week, 9am-5pm est availability.

Hourly wage: $12/hr

Start date: If experience in CRO is observed from marketing director, and when all changes in stage 2 are implemented/

Information: Implementation, design in Figma, website and client experience analysis.



Next steps if interested:

- Reply with your resume including your entire career history.

- Include "Horse Year" in your title.

- Reply with any supporting backend documents that supports evidence to your resume.

- Reply with questions if there is any.



You will then get a brief of what needs to be done if your expertise suffices. Steps after getting the brief is mentioned above.

title: Mortgage Operations & Client Support Specialist

You will work directly with the Mortgage Broker and alongside our Lead Assistant, helping manage residential and commercial loan workflows across multiple systems.



This is not an entry-level position. You must understand US mortgage products, loan structure, borrower documentation, and processing flow.



???? Mortgage Operations & Client Support Specialist



Mortgage Consulting Group (Centennial, CO – Remote Role)

Schedule: 1:00 PM – 7:00 PM Mountain Time + Saturdays (Open House Coverage)

Remote (US Mortgage Experience Required)



We are seeking a highly organized, mortgage-experienced operations professional to support our growing mortgage platform.



You will work directly with the Mortgage Broker and alongside our Lead Assistant (Chrislene), helping manage residential and commercial loan workflows across multiple systems.



This is not an entry-level position. You must understand US mortgage products, loan structure, borrower documentation, and processing flow.

Bonus Experience
